Description: Gene that the resource is related to
Name/title of the dataset
Institution where work was performed
Paragraph description of the dataset
Principle investigator of the dataset
Person(s) performing associated experiments
Assay(s) associated with the data (BAO IDs)
Data file format(s) - MS, txt, HDF5, etc.
Repository(ies) where data are stored
Link to external data repository containing key dataset metadata
Data endpoint format (log2 expression, fold change, etc.)
Physical entity/method to calculate endpoint - fluorescence intensity, mass spec, etc.
On target activity as reported to chemicalprobes.org
External ID (PubChem, CheBI, ZINC, etc.) corresponding to the canonical representation
Repository corresponding to the external ID
Mode of action towards given gene
External link to the data deposited in public repository/location
Canonical (trade or IUPAC) name of molecule
Name and structure of inactive analog (probe is the active analog in the 'probe pair')
Link to chemicalprobes.org where the probe is registered
Link to the vendor for the physical sample
Selectivity against similar genes as reported to chemicalprobes.or
